Title: Graduation Day
Plot: Isabelle seeks revenge on the Nova Group after they attack Shawn. Alana confronts the man responsible for killing her husband and son in a car accident nine years ago.
GuestStars: Kurt Fuller,  Erica Carroll,  Emilio Salituro,  Deni De Lory,  Danny Dorosh,  Ulla Friis,  Julia Tortolano,  Rob LaBelle,  Ian Tracey,  Carter Jenkins
